name: Fishing Rod Upgrade
desc:
Upgrades your fishing rod one tier. 
Makes you more likely to get rare loot.

name: Fishing Bait: Tier 1
desc:
Gives you a boost to fishing for 5 casts. 
Makes you more likely to get rare loot.

name: Fishing Bait: Tier 2
desc:
Gives you a boost to fishing for 5 casts. 
Makes you more likely to get rare loot.
